title: Is jungle Zac too strong?
body:
Can we just be honest? He does a lot VERY well. Incredible engages, incredible tankiness, good damage.

He is almost always oppressive. He is never a bad pick in nearly any team comp.

Why does Riot let stuff like this exist for so long while they gut other champions?

I have never once seen Zac on the enemy team and not groan.  I have never once seen Zac picked on my team and not got excited or at least nodded in approval of such a solid pick.

I know most of you feel the same way.

replies.body:
he lacks in dmg:)..he has 0 dmg and his ap scalling sucks.  his clear speed sucks (compared with other champs), and his early game is so bad, that almost every jungler out there can fck him up.

Luckily the balancing of champions revolves around high elo players:)

Okay well my experience of over 5000 ranked matches has never shown me any of that. 99% of the time over the last 2 years, he is a solid pick.  So tell me, when you see zac on the other team are you like, "this will be easy no big deal" ?

But you are factually wrong, he has a lot of damage  built in considering how tanky he gets to be, and he does % max health magic damage.

> [{quoted}](name=DonnieDarkin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yz5GuAjR,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-03-25T01:24:53.732+0000)

> 
> But you are factually wrong, he has a lot of damage  built in considering how tanky he gets to be, and he does % max health magic damage.

yes, everytime i see a zac jungle, i know i will have free reign over him:)

 you also need to tell me your elo/rank so i know that those  5000 games mean something
cool the statistics guy .....yes i doubt he has played 5000k games, but probabilty would state that he would get crapped on a handful of times
skarner cant and has a worse clear time
